name: grid_navigation_robot
description: Navigate a 10x10 grid world with obstacles and items, using a robot to collect items and deliver them to a base.

turns.query: Start your collection mission. First, check your current battery level. Use detect_items_in_range(5) to find nearby items. Calculate the distance to each detected item and identify the closest one. Move to the closest item and pick it up. Report your position after picking up the item.

Good progress! Now check your battery level. If battery is below 30%, you need to head to the charger at (9,9) immediately. Otherwise, find the item with the highest value among remaining items (use world.get_all_item_positions() to see what's left), move to it and pick it up. Be careful - there's a wall of obstacles around x=5, you'll need to find the gap at (5,5) to cross to the east side. After picking up, check your total inventory weight and value.

Time to finish the mission. First, check if you can reach the base at (0,0) with your current battery (use robot.can_reach(0,0)). If you cannot reach the base, go to the charger at (9,9) first and charge, then head to base. If you can reach the base, go directly. Once at base, deliver all items using drop_all(). Store the total value of items you collected during this mission in mission_total_value, and set mission_complete to True.
